languages.text: Главный технопровидец медленно плыл между замершими рядами сервиторов, вглядываясь в их лица и проверяя показатели приборов. В действиях Паскаля не было спешки — с завораживающим тщанием он изучал каждую единицу на своем пути, и бинарные молитвы сопровождали его изыскание.

traits.locale_text: Старший Технопровидец медленно плыл между замершими рядами сервиторов, вглядываясь в их лица и проверяя показатели приборов. В действиях Паскаля не было спешки — с завораживающим тщанием он изучал каждую единицу на своем пути, и бинарные молитвы сопровождали его изыскание.

languages.text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.
languages.original_text: Главный технопровидец медленно плыл между замершими рядами сервиторов, вглядываясь в их лица и проверяя показатели приборов. В действиях Паскаля не было спешки — с завораживающим тщанием он изучал каждую единицу на своем пути, и бинарные молитвы сопровождали его изыскание.

traits.locale_text: The Chief Enginseer slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

The Chief Enginseer slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

languages.text: 機関整備師主任はゆっくりと動かないサーヴィターたちの隊列に入り、彼らの顔をのぞき込み、測定値を確認した。パスカルの行動に急ぐところはなかった。魅惑的な念入りさで、彼は行く手にあるすべてのユニットを検査した。彼の調査に付き合うバイナリックの祈りと共に。
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: 機関整備師主任はゆっくりと動かないサーヴィターたちの隊列に入り、彼らの顔をのぞき込み、測定値を確認した。パスカルの行動に急ぐところはなかった。魅惑的な念入りさで、彼は行く手にあるすべてのユニットを検査した。彼の調査に付き合うバイナリックの祈りと共に。

languages.text: Lentement, le technaugure primus se déplaça parmi les rangs immobiles des servitors, scrutant leurs visages et examinant les relevés. Pasqal prit tout son temps : avec une application fascinante, il inspecta chacune des unités qui se trouvaient sur son chemin, accompagnant son enquête de prières binhaires.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: Lentement, le technaugure primus se déplaça parmi les rangs immobiles des servitors, scrutant leurs visages et examinant les relevés. Pasqal prit tout son temps : avec une application fascinante, il inspecta chacune des unités qui se trouvaient sur son chemin, accompagnant son enquête de prières binhaires.

languages.text: 尊敬的贤者慢慢走到一动不动的机仆之中，打量着他们的脸，检查着读数。帕斯卡的动作没有任何匆忙之意，他以令人尊重的勤勉态度，检查了他遇到的每个机仆。他一边检查，一边以二进制语进行祈祷。
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: 尊敬的贤者慢慢走到一动不动的奴工之中，打量着他们的脸，检查着读数。帕斯卡的动作没有任何匆忙之意，他以令人尊重的勤勉态度，检查了他遇到的每个奴工。他一边检查，一边以二进制语进行祈祷。

languages.text: El visioingeniero primero se adentró lentamente entre las filas inmóviles de servidores, observando sus rostros y examinando las lecturas. No había ninguna prisa en los actos de Pasqal: con una diligencia hipnótica, estudió todas y cada una de las unidades en su camino, acompañado en todo momento de rezos binarios durante la investigación.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: El visioingeniero primero se adentró lentamente entre las filas inmóviles de servidores, observando sus rostros y examinando las lecturas. No había ninguna prisa en los actos de Pasqal: con una diligencia hipnótica, estudió todas y cada una de las unidades en su camino, acompañado en todo momento de rezos binarios durante la investigación.

languages.text: Der Maschinenseher Primus schritt langsam in die reglosen Reihen der Servitoren, blickte in ihre Gesichter und überprüfte ihre Werte. Pasqal zeigte keinerlei Eile. Mit hypnotischer Sorgfalt inspizierte er jede einzelne Einheit, begleitet von binhären Gebeten.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: Der Maschinenseher Primus schritt langsam in die reglosen Reihen der Servitoren, blickte in ihre Gesichter und überprüfte ihre Werte. Pasqal zeigte keinerlei Eile. Mit hypnotischer Sorgfalt inspizierte er jede einzelne Einheit, begleitet von binhären Gebeten.

languages.text: Başmühedyum; hareketsiz hizmetörlerin arasına yavaşça girip yüzlerine bakıyor, okunan değerleri inceliyordu. Pasqal'ın hareketlerinden hiç acele etmediği anlaşılıyordu: Fevkalade bir iradeyle önündeki her birimi tetkik ediyor, ikilidilde dualar da bu süreçte yoldaşı oluyordu.
languages.original_text: The Enginseer Prime slowly waded into the motionless ranks of the servitors, peering into their faces and checking the readings. There was no haste in Pasqal's actions: with mesmerising diligence, he inspected every single unit in his path, and binharic prayers were his companions in this investigation.

traits.locale_text: Başmühedyum, hareketsiz hizmetörlerin arasına yavaşça girip yüzlerine bakıyor; okunan değerleri inceliyordu. Pasqal'ın hareketlerinden hiç acele etmediği anlaşılıyordu: Fevkalade bir iradeyle önündeki her birimi tetkik ediyor, ikilidilde dualar da bu süreçte yoldaşı oluyordu.
